sentence.Network_en: To search an effective therapeutic method in treatment of bedsore.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的寻找一种治疗褥疮的有效方法.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Compound plantain ointment has certain treatment function to bedsore.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论复方车前草软膏对褥疮有一定的治疗作用.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the effect of compound plantain ointment in curing bedsore.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究复方车前草软膏对褥疮的治疗作用.
